name: WKN 0'nline Demo
description:
WKN 0'nline is a game that I started doing about half a year ago, but dropped it eventually, doing multiplayer games is extremely tideous imo, but nonetheless I wanted to share this tech demo which is more of a proof of concept, and tbh it's pretty fun. I doubt I'd be finishing this tho, but still I appreciate any feedback :>

Controls:

W,A,S,D Movement

E - Interact

RMB, LMB - Attack, Shoot

To enter a game you need to type the same IP Address that host entered - it should be host's local IP, the game operates on local network, but it's possible to play with hamachi if the second person isn't connected to your network.
